translation.Message_0_Page_0: About a month ago I was minding my own business until Kira held me at gunpoint while screaming nonsensically about someone named "Markus" I think?. They talked her down and they apologised saying she just lost someone and was going through a tough time.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: The two of them then helped me get to a place I needed to be which was nice! I'm also happy Kira seems to have calmed down...
